name: PersonalAffirmations
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: personal affirmations
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Listen to your "own" affirmations given by your therapist or created by yourself. Upload them at "https://personalaffirmations.in/" as text or record and upload 
as audio file and listen them daily. Affirmations work to make all aspects of your life better and increases positivity in you. Just by listening your affirmations daily can have
drastic effect on your life, dive into personalaffirmations for a new life :)

How it works :-

1) Enable the skill and while enabling perform the account linking with the amazon's account with which your alexa device is registered.
2) Login into https://personalaffirmations.in/ with the same amazon's account. ( <-- PLEASE DON'T MISS THIS STEP AFTER ENABLING THE SKILL)
3) Save your personal affirmations as a text or record in your own voice and upload as audio file.
4) Launch the skill by saying "Alexa, open personal affirmations"
5) Listen to it daily and have a good life ahead!


For any technical issues while using this skill send an email to kailashpanwar@gmail.com
